[Home](./index.md) &gt; [cloudfunc](./cloudfunc.md) &gt; [Container](./cloudfunc.container.md)

## Container class


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Container extends ContainerProcess 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [ContainerProcess](./cloudfunc.containerprocess.md)

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addEntryPoint(entry)](./cloudfunc.container.addentrypoint.md) |  | Set entry point, this means than the class selected for the entry point will be executed when the lambda/function is running. |
|  [addInterceptor(interceptor)](./cloudfunc.container.addinterceptor.md) |  | Set an interceptor, this means than the class selected for the interceptor will be executed when a exception is throw. |
|  [addModules(modules)](./cloudfunc.container.addmodules.md) |  | Set multiple modules than going to enable an injection of couple services in the container and this will be available for usage in all components injectables. |
|  [addServices(dependencies)](./cloudfunc.container.addservices.md) |  | Set multiple services than going to enable an injection of a service in the container and this will be available for usage in all components injectables. |
